statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={186.7}{e}^{{{0.0374}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements; round accordingly.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0374}}\approx{1.038108181073}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.038108181073}-{1}={0.038108181073004}\approx{0.0381} and the percent is 3.81.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
